thread.title: California metro janitor who made $250K caught not working | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: California metro janitor who made $250K caught not working | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: California metro janitor who made $250K caught not working | Daily Mail Online
text: San Francisco transit janitor who makes more than $250K a year - $160K in overtime - is caught hiding for hours in a closet doing nothing Liang Zhang earned $270K in 2015 for cleaning metro station in San Francisco His timecard for BART showed he worked 17-hour days for 18 days straight Investigation revealed he would take breaks for hours when he was on the clock One day he spent a total of two hours in the closet in the afternoon and evening BART managers said despite his high pay, there won't be a future audit Published: 06:56 GMT, 7 February 2017 | Updated: 10:45 GMT, 7 February 2017 101 shares
